price: 62. Allah melapangkan rezeki bagi orang yang Dia kehendaki di antara hamba-hamba-Nya dan Dia (pula) yang membatasi baginya. Sungguh, Allah Maha Mengetahui segala sesuatu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu min ʿibādihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
